description: In this pregrade career, I was able to develop a solid base of knowledge in the field of computer science, which allowed me to continue my studies in the Systems Engineering career. I also had the opportunity to work on different projects, which allowed me to gain experience in the field.
In this new career, I am acquiring more advanced knowledge in the field of computer science, which will allow me to continue growing in the field.
In this bootcamp, I was able to develop my skills as a frontend developer, learning the Angular framework.
